name: Boarding Node
description: The easiest way to invite your TestFlight beta testers. The App Name is the name of the Heroku application, not the name of your app.

ITC_APP_ID.description: The App ID or App Identifier (Bundle Identifier) of your app from iTunes Connect, to which the tester will be invited.

ITC_APP_TESTER_GROUP.description: Optional: The group you want the invited to be placed in

GA_PROPERTY_ID.description: Optional: Configure Google Analytics to track visitors on your website.

PRIVACY_URL.description: Optional: URL to privacy policy. The link is shown on the invite page.
